sentences.sentence: He can outlast anyone on the dance floor.
sentences.translation: 在舞场上，他比谁都能跳。

sentences.sentence: These naturally dried flowers will outlast a bouquet of fresh blooms.
sentences.translation: 这些自然风干的花会比一束鲜花更为持久。

sentences.sentence: None of this may outlast the election.
sentences.translation: 这些事情持续的时间都没有选举长。
